channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-4404|2024-08-06T00:25:14.537Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20keyview
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in the Filter SDK component of HP KeyView earlier than v11.2. The vulnerability could be exploited remotely to allow code execution via a memory allocation issue.

item.title: CVE-2016-4406|2024-08-06T00:25:14.527Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20integrated%20lights-out%203%20%28ilo%203%29%2C%20hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%204%20%28ilo%204%29
item.description: A remote cross site scripting vulnerability was identified in HPE iLO 3 all version prior to v1.88 and HPE iLO 4 all versions prior to v2.44.

item.title: CVE-2016-8519|2024-08-06T02:27:41.172Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- operations%20orchestration
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in HPE Operations Orchestration Community edition and Enterprise edition prior to v10.70 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-8514|2024-08-06T02:27:41.018Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- version%20control%20repository%20manager%20%28vcrm%29
item.description: A remote information disclosure in HPE Version Control Repository Manager (VCRM) was found. The problem impacts all versions prior to 7.6.

item.title: CVE-2016-8523|2024-08-06T02:27:40.373Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- smart%20storage%20administrator
item.description: A Remote Arbitrary Code Execution vulnerability in HPE Smart Storage Administrator version before v2.60.18.0 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-4392|2024-08-06T00:25:14.519Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20business%20service%20manager
item.description: A remote cross site scripting vulnerability has been identified in HP Business Service Management software v9.1x, v9.20 - v9.25IP1.

item.title: CVE-2016-8517|2024-08-06T02:27:40.822Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- systems%20insight%20manager%20using%20openssl
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability in HPE Systems Insight Manager in all versions prior to 7.6 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-8532|2024-08-06T02:27:40.339Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- matrix%20operating%20environment
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability in HPE Matrix Operating Environment version 7.6 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-8511|2024-08-06T02:27:40.195Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- network%20automation
item.description: A Remote Code Execution vulnerability in HPE Network Automation using RPCServlet and Java Deserialization version v9.1x, v9.2x, v10.00, v10.00.01, v10.00.02, v10.10, v10.11, v10.11.01, v10.20 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-8512|2024-08-06T02:27:40.554Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- loadrunner%20and%20performance%20center
item.description: A Remote Code Execution vulnerability in all versions of HPE LoadRunner and Performance Center was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-8526|2024-08-06T02:27:40.343Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20airwave
item.description: Aruba Airwave all versions up to, but not including, 8.2.3.1 is vulnerable to an XML external entities (XXE). XXEs are a way to permit XML parsers to access storage that exist on external systems. If an unprivileged user is permitted to control the contents of XML files, XXE can be used as an attack vector. Because the XML parser has access to the local filesystem and runs with the permissions of the web server, it can access any file that is readable by the web server and copy it to an external system of the attacker's choosing. This could include files that contain passwords, which could then lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2016-8528|2024-08-06T02:27:41.056Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- helion%20eucalyptus
item.description: A Remote Escalation of Privilege vulnerability in HPE Helion Eucalyptus version 3.3.0 through 4.3.1 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-8534|2024-08-06T02:27:40.847Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- matrix%20operating%20environment
item.description: A remote privilege elevation vulnerability in HPE Matrix Operating Environment version 7.6 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-4402|2024-08-06T00:25:14.523Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20keyview
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in the Filter SDK component of HP KeyView earlier than v11.2. The vulnerability could be exploited remotely to allow code execution via buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2016-8521|2024-08-06T02:27:40.717Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- diagnostics
item.description: A Remote click jacking vulnerability in HPE Diagnostics version 9.24 IP1, 9.26 , 9.26IP1 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-8531|2024-08-06T02:27:40.424Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- matrix%20operating%20environment
item.description: A remote information disclosure vulnerability in HPE Matrix Operating Environment version 7.6 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-8527|2024-08-06T02:27:40.339Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- aruba%20airwave
item.description: Aruba Airwave all versions up to, but not including, 8.2.3.1 is vulnerable to a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS). The vulnerability is present in the VisualRF component of AirWave. By exploiting this vulnerability, an attacker who can trick a logged-in AirWave administrative user into clicking a link could obtain sensitive information, such as session cookies or passwords. The vulnerability requires that an administrative users click on the malicious link while currently logged into AirWave in the same browser.

item.title: CVE-2016-8515|2024-08-06T02:27:41.193Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- version%20control%20repository%20manager%20%28vcrm%29
item.description: A remote malicious file upload vulnerability in HPE Version Control Repository Manager (VCRM) was found. The problem impacts all versions prior to 7.6.

item.title: CVE-2016-8533|2024-08-06T02:27:40.813Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- matrix%20operating%20environment
item.description: A remote priviledge escalation vulnerability in HPE Matrix Operating Environment version 7.6 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-4403|2024-08-06T00:25:14.551Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20keyview
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in the Filter SDK component of HP KeyView earlier than v11.2. The vulnerability could be exploited remotely to allow code execution via memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2016-8535|2024-08-06T02:27:41.244Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- matrix%20operating%20environment
item.description: A remote HTTP parameter Pollution vulnerability in HPE Matrix Operating Environment version 7.6 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-4399|2024-08-06T00:25:14.527Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20network%20node%20manager%20%28nnmi%29
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in HP Network Node Manager i (NNMi) Software 10.00, 10.01 (patch1), 10.01 (patch 2), 10.10. The vulnerability could result in cross-site scripting (XSS).

item.title: CVE-2016-8516|2024-08-06T02:27:40.197Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- systems%20insight%20manager%20using%20openssl
item.description: A remote denial of service vulnerability in HPE Systems Insight Manager in all versions prior to 7.6 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-4397|2024-08-06T00:25:14.517Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20network%20node%20manager%20%28nnmi%29
item.description: A local code execution security vulnerability was identified in HP Network Node Manager i (NNMi) v10.00, v10.10 and v10.20 Software.

item.title: CVE-2016-4400|2024-08-06T00:25:14.586Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20network%20node%20manager%20%28nnmi%29
item.description: A security vulnerability was identified in HP Network Node Manager i (NNMi) Software 10.00, 10.01 (patch1), 10.01 (patch 2), 10.10. The vulnerability could result in cross-site scripting (XSS).

item.title: CVE-2016-8529|2024-08-06T02:27:40.678Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- storevirtual%204000%20storage%20and%20storevirtual%20vsa%20software%20running%20lefthand%20os
item.description: A Remote Arbitrary Command Execution vulnerability in HPE StoreVirtual 4000 Storage and StoreVirtual VSA Software running LeftHand OS version v12.5 and earlier was found. The problem was resolved in LeftHand OS v12.6 or any subsequent version.

item.title: CVE-2016-8518|2024-08-06T02:27:40.367Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- systems%20insight%20manager%20using%20openssl
item.description: A remote denial of service vulnerability in HPE Systems Insight Manager in all versions prior to 7.6 was found.

item.description: A remote arbitrary code execution vulnerability was identified in HP Network Node Manager i (NNMi) Software 10.00, 10.01 (patch1), 10.01 (patch 2), 10.10 using Java Deserialization.

item.title: CVE-2016-8513|2024-08-06T02:27:40.982Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- version%20control%20repository%20manager%20%28vcrm%29
item.description: A Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in HPE Version Control Repository Manager (VCRM) was found. The problem impacts all versions prior to 7.6.

item.title: CVE-2016-8520|2024-08-06T02:27:40.198Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- helion%20eucalyptus
item.description: HPE Helion Eucalyptus v4.3.0 and earlier does not correctly check IAM user's permissions for accessing versioned objects and ACLs. In some cases, authenticated users with S3 permissions could also access versioned data.

item.title: CVE-2016-4391|2024-08-06T00:25:14.575Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20arcsight%20winc%20connector
item.description: A remote code execution security vulnerability has been identified in all versions of the HP ArcSight WINC Connector prior to v7.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2016-8522|2024-08-06T02:27:40.899Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- diagnostics
item.description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability in HPE Diagnostics version 9.24 IP1, 9.26 , 9.26IP1 was found.

item.title: CVE-2016-4405|2024-08-06T00:25:14.524Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hp%20business%20service%20manager
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability was identified in HP Business Service Management (BSM) using Apache Commons Collection Java Deserialization versions v9.20-v9.26

item.title: CVE-2016-8530|2024-08-06T02:27:40.481Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- imc%20plat
item.description: A remote denial of service vulnerability in HPE iMC PLAT version v7.2 E0403P06 and earlier was found. The problem was resolved in iMC PLAT 7.3 E0504 or subsequent version.

item.title: CVE-2016-8525|2024-08-06T02:27:40.440Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- imc%20plat
item.description: A Remote Disclosure of Information vulnerability in HPE iMC PLAT version v7.2 E0403P06 and earlier was found. The problem was resolved in iMC PLAT 7.3 E0504 or subsequent version.

item.title: CVE-2024-22439|2024-08-01T22:43:34.952Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20flexnetwork%20and%20flexfabric%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE FlexFabric and FlexNetwork series products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain privileged access to switches resulting in information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-22438|2024-08-01T22:43:34.942Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20officeconnect%201820%20network%20switches
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Hewlett Packard Enterprise OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow execution of malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22443|2024-08-01T22:43:34.951Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a server-side prototype pollution attack. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system leading to complete system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2024-22440|2024-08-01T22:43:34.942Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20compute%20scale-up%20server%203200%20server
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Compute Scale-up Server 3200 server. This vulnerability could cause disclosure of sensitive information in log files.

item.title: CVE-2024-22444|2024-08-01T22:43:34.992Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability within the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow a remote attacker to conduct a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against a user of the interface. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victims browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-22437|2024-08-01T22:43:34.946Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20msa%20san%20storage%20vss%20provider%20and%20capi%20proxy%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in VSS Provider and CAPI Proxy software for certain HPE MSA storage products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain elevated privilege on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22435|2024-08-01T22:43:34.953Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20nonstop%20web%20viewpoint%20enterprise%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Web ViewPoint Enterprise software. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow unauthorized users to access some resources on a NonStop system.

item.title: CVE-2024-41914|2024-07-25T13:28:20.840Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20aruba%20networking%20edgeconnect%20sd-wan%20orchestrator
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against an administrative user of the interface. A successful exploit allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victim's browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of EdgeConnect SD-WAN Orchestrator could allow an authenticated remote attacker to conduct a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against an administrative user of the interface.
